title: Leather gloves/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Leather_gloves "Leather gloves")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| \[ [![Leather gloves.png](/images/9/95/Leather_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Leather_gloves.png)   \[ [![Padded gloves.png](/images/4/47/Padded_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Padded_gloves.png)   \[ [![Riding gloves.png](/images/e/ed/Riding_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Riding_gloves.png)   \[ [![Fencing gloves.png](/images/c/ce/Fencing_gloves.png)](/wiki/File:Fencing_gloves.png)***皮手套 |                                                                                                                  |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| 外观                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)") |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                  |
| 装备槽位                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | [手套](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "手套")                                                                              |
| AC                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [1](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%A4%E7%94%B2%E7%AD%89%E7%BA%A7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "护甲等级 (page does not exist)")  |
| 特殊效果                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | *（无）*                                                                                                            |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   |                                                                                                                  |
| 基础价                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | 8 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                            |
| 重量                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [10](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")                     |
| 材料                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                | [皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")                     |

**皮手套**（leather gloves）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[手套](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "手套")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。[武士](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%A6%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "武士 (page does not exist)")角色称呼此防具为**和弓手套**（yugake）。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)
  - [3.1 鉴定](#.E9.89.B4.E5.AE.9A)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 起源](#.E8.B5.B7.E6.BA.90)

- [6 Variants](#Variants)

  - [6.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [6.2 NetHack brass](#NetHack_brass)
  - [6.3 dNetHack](#dNetHack)
  - [6.4 EvilHack](#EvilHack)

- [7 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)
  - [7.1 和弓手套](#.E5.92.8C.E5.BC.93.E6.89.8B.E5.A5.97)

- [8 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

[医生](/index.php?title=%E5%8C%BB%E7%94%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "医生 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一双+1皮手套，[骑士](/index.php?title=%E9%AA%91%E5%A3%AB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "骑士 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一双+0皮手套，[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时会获得一双+2皮手套[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。[野蛮人](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8E%E8%9B%AE%E4%BA%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "野蛮人 (page does not exist)")、武士和[女武神](/index.php?title=%E5%A5%B3%E6%AD%A6%E7%A5%9E\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "女武神 (page does not exist)")在游戏开始时即鉴定皮手套[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)。

[刺客](/index.php?title=%E5%88%BA%E5%AE%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "刺客 (page does not exist)")在生成时有1⁄2的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一双皮手套。[雇佣兵](/index.php?title=%E9%9B%87%E4%BD%A3%E5%85%B5\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "雇佣兵 (page does not exist)")类怪物（如[警卫员](/index.php?title=%E8%AD%A6%E5%8D%AB%E5%91%98\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "警卫员 (page does not exist)")和[岩德军团](/index.php?title=%E5%B2%A9%E5%BE%B7%E5%86%9B%E5%9B%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "岩德军团 (page does not exist)")士兵）在生成时常携带皮手套[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)[\[9\]](#cite_note-9)。

## 描述

皮手套的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1。

## 策略

虽然缺少[敏捷手套](/wiki/%E6%95%8F%E6%8D%B7%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "敏捷手套")或[力量手套](/wiki/%E5%8A%9B%E9%87%8F%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "力量手套")的特殊加成，皮手套仍然是实用的防具，并且可以在[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")中占据一席之地：玩家需要一双手套来防止自己误触[鸡蛇](/index.php?title=%E9%B8%A1%E8%9B%87\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鸡蛇 (page does not exist)")导致死亡，穿戴手套也允许玩家持握鸡蛇尸体用作武器。如果你确定要长期使用某双手套，你可以考虑优先把[防具附魔卷轴](/index.php?title=%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94%E5%8D%B7%E8%BD%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "防具附魔卷轴 (page does not exist)")用在手套上，因为手套不会因为玩家被意外[变形](/index.php?title=%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "变形 (page does not exist)")而被摧毁。

你可以从岩德军团那里获得大量的皮手套，以作为备用防具，或是用于[批量变形](/index.php?title=%E6%89%B9%E9%87%8F%E5%8F%98%E5%BD%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "批量变形 (page does not exist)")。

### 鉴定

皮手套可以轻松地通过[价格鉴定](/index.php?title=%E4%BB%B7%E6%A0%BC%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "价格鉴定 (page does not exist)")来鉴别，因为它的基础价只有8 [zm](/wiki/Zm/zh-CN "Zm/zh-CN")，是所有手套里最低的。

## 历史

皮手套最初于[Hack 1.0](/wiki/Hack_1.0 "Hack 1.0")加入游戏。到[NetHack 2.3e](/wiki/NetHack_2.3e "NetHack 2.3e")为止，皮手套的名称是**手套**（pair of gloves），且游戏中仅有皮手套一种手套。

## 起源

“弽（汉语拼音：shè）”（yugake）是一种日本弓道用手套。其通常是双层结构，内层由棉制成，外层由鹿皮等兽皮制成，穿戴时保护持弓者的拇指、食指、中指三指。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Leather_gloves/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

Variants with [object materials](/wiki/Object_materials "Object materials") systems will usually refer to the leather gloves as a "pair of gloves" with the object's material appended (e.g. "a pair of [cloth](/wiki/Cloth "Cloth") gloves").

In variants that incorporate the [Jedi](/wiki/Jedi "Jedi") role, all Jedi start the game with a +0 pair of leather gloves.

In variants that incorporate the [Pirate](/wiki/Pirate "Pirate") role, [Mayor Cummerbund](/wiki/Mayor_Cummerbund "Mayor Cummerbund") will generate with leather gloves, as will [githyanki pirates](/wiki/Githyanki_pirate "Githyanki pirate").

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), leather gloves can be [upgraded](/wiki/Upgraded "Upgraded") into either [gauntlets of swimming](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_swimming "Gauntlets of swimming") or [gauntlets of dexterity](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_dexterity "Gauntlets of dexterity"); upgrading either of those gloves will produce leather gloves.

The [statue trap](/wiki/Statue_trap "Statue trap") of an [arch-lich](/wiki/Arch-lich "Arch-lich") in the [Lawful Quest](/wiki/Lawful_Quest "Lawful Quest") contains a cursed -1 pair of leather gloves.

### NetHack brass

In [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass"), leather gloves do not give any base AC.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), leather gloves grant 0 base AC and 1 base [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") while worn - they are renamed to a "pair of gloves", and their material is always displayed. [Gauntlets](/wiki/Gauntlets_\(dNetHack\) "Gauntlets (dNetHack)") exist as a 'hard-material' counterpart to gloves.

All [Nobles](/wiki/Noble "Noble") start the game with a pair of gloves, and [dwarven](/wiki/Dwarf_\(starting_race\) "Dwarf (starting race)") [Binders](/wiki/Binder "Binder") start the game with a +0 burnt pair of gloves.

[Center of All](/wiki/Center_of_All "Center of All") is generated with a large [concordant](/wiki/Object_properties#dNetHack "Object properties") +0 pair of leather gloves.

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), [gauntlets](/wiki/Gauntlets_\(EvilHack\) "Gauntlets (EvilHack)") are also present as a 'hard-material' counterpart to leather gloves - all Knights start with gauntlets in place of leather gloves save for [Elven](/wiki/Elf_\(starting_race\) "Elf (starting race)") Knights, who retain their leather gloves due to [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron") allergies, and [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") Knights, who are similarly averse to iron and receive [their own racial gloves](/wiki/Dark_elven_gloves "Dark elven gloves").

[Dragonbane](/wiki/Dragonbane_\(EvilHack\) "Dragonbane (EvilHack)") has its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") changed to a pair of [dragonhide](/wiki/Dragonhide "Dragonhide") gloves.

## 百科文本

### 和弓手套

Japanese leather archery gloves. Gloves made for use while  
practicing had thumbs reinforced with horn. Those worn into  
battle had thumbs reinforced with a double layer of leather.

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 497](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/objects.c#L497)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 61](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L61)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 79](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L79)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 86](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L86)
5. [↑](#cite_ref-5) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 688](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L688)
6. [↑](#cite_ref-6) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 764](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L764)
7. [↑](#cite_ref-7) [src/u\_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 786](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/u_init.c#L786)
8. [↑](#cite_ref-8) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 315](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L315)
9. [↑](#cite_ref-9) [src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 647](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/makemon.c#L647)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Leather gloves/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Leather gloves
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
[    [    [    [ 
皮手套
外观 随机
装备槽位 手套
AC 1
特殊效果

（无）

基础价 8 zm
重量 10
材料 皮革

皮手套（leather gloves）是NetHack中的一种手套类防具。它由皮革制成，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。武士角色称呼此防具为和弓手套（yugake）。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
    • 3.1 鉴定
  • 4 历史
  • 5 起源
  • 6 Variants
    • 6.1 SLASH'EM
    • 6.2 NetHack brass
    • 6.3 dNetHack
    • 6.4 EvilHack
  • 7 百科文本
    • 7.1 和弓手套
  • 8 引用及注释

生成

医生在游戏开始时会获得一双+1皮手套，骑士在游戏开始时会获得一双+0皮手套，僧侣在游戏开始时会获得一双+2皮手套[2][3][4]。野蛮人、武士和女武神在游戏开始时即鉴定皮手套[5][6][7]。

刺客在生成时有1⁄2的概率获得一双皮手套。雇佣兵类怪物（如警卫员和岩德军团士兵）在生成时常携带皮手套[8][9]。

描述

皮手套的基础AC加成为1。

策略

虽然缺少敏捷手套或力量手套的特殊加成，皮手套仍然是实用的防具，并且可以在飞升套件中占据一席之地：玩家需要一双手套来防止自己误触鸡蛇导致死亡，穿戴手套也允许玩家持握鸡蛇尸体用作武器。如果你确定要长期使用某双手套，你可以考虑优先把防具附魔卷轴用在手套上，因为手套不会因为玩家被意外变形而被摧毁。

你可以从岩德军团那里获得大量的皮手套，以作为备用防具，或是用于批量变形。

鉴定

皮手套可以轻松地通过价格鉴定来鉴别，因为它的基础价只有8 zm，是所有手套里最低的。

历史

皮手套最初于Hack 1.0加入游戏。到NetHack 2.3e为止，皮手套的名称是手套（pair of gloves），且游戏中仅有皮手套一种手套。

起源

“弽（汉语拼音：shè）”（yugake）是一种日本弓道用手套。其通常是双层结构，内层由棉制成，外层由鹿皮等兽皮制成，穿戴时保护持弓者的拇指、食指、中指三指。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

Variants with object materials systems will usually refer to the leather gloves as a "pair of gloves" with the object's material appended (e.g. "a pair of cloth gloves").

In variants that incorporate the Jedi role, all Jedi start the game with a +0 pair of leather gloves.

In variants that incorporate the Pirate role, Mayor Cummerbund will generate with leather gloves, as will githyanki pirates.

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, leather gloves can be upgraded into either gauntlets of swimming or gauntlets of dexterity; upgrading either of those gloves will produce leather gloves.

The statue trap of an arch-lich in the Lawful Quest contains a cursed -1 pair of leather gloves.

NetHack brass

In NetHack brass, leather gloves do not give any base AC.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, leather gloves grant 0 base AC and 1 base DR while worn - they are renamed to a "pair of gloves", and their material is always displayed. Gauntlets exist as a 'hard-material' counterpart to gloves.

All Nobles start the game with a pair of gloves, and dwarven Binders start the game with a +0 burnt pair of gloves.

Center of All is generated with a large concordant +0 pair of leather gloves.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, gauntlets are also present as a 'hard-material' counterpart to leather gloves - all Knights start with gauntlets in place of leather gloves save for Elven Knights, who retain their leather gloves due to iron allergies, and drow Knights, who are similarly averse to iron and receive their own racial gloves.

Dragonbane has its base item changed to a pair of dragonhide gloves.

百科文本

和弓手套

Japanese leather archery gloves. Gloves made for use while
practicing had thumbs reinforced with horn. Those worn into
battle had thumbs reinforced with a double layer of leather.

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/objects.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 497
  2. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 61
  3. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 79
  4. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 86
  5. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 688
  6. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 764
  7. ↑ src/u_init.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 786
  8. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 315
  9. ↑ src/makemon.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 647

rawPage:
{{needhelp/zh-CN}}
{{languages}}
{{armor/zh-CN
  |top={{gloves top}}
  |name=皮手套
  |appearance={{random appearance/zh-CN}}
  |cost=8
  |slot=手套
  |ac=1
  |weight=10
  |material=皮革
}}
'''皮手套'''（leather gloves）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[手套]]类[[防具]]。它由[[皮革]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|497|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。[[武士]]角色称呼此防具为'''和弓手套'''（yugake）。

== 生成 ==
[[医生]]在游戏开始时会获得一双+1皮手套，[[骑士]]在游戏开始时会获得一双+0皮手套，[[僧侣]]在游戏开始时会获得一双+2皮手套{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|61|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|79|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|86|nethack=3.6.7}}。[[野蛮人]]、武士和[[女武神]]在游戏开始时即鉴定皮手套{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|688|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|764|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/u_init.c|786|nethack=3.6.7}}。

[[刺客]]在生成时有{{frac|2}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一双皮手套。[[雇佣兵]]类怪物（如[[警卫员]]和[[岩德军团]]士兵）在生成时常携带皮手套{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|315|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/makemon.c|647|nethack=3.6.7}}。

== 描述 ==
皮手套的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1。

== 策略 ==
虽然缺少[[敏捷手套]]或[[力量手套]]的特殊加成，皮手套仍然是实用的防具，并且可以在[[飞升套件]]中占据一席之地：玩家需要一双手套来防止自己误触[[鸡蛇]]导致死亡，穿戴手套也允许玩家持握鸡蛇尸体用作武器。如果你确定要长期使用某双手套，你可以考虑优先把[[防具附魔卷轴]]用在手套上，因为手套不会因为玩家被意外[[变形]]而被摧毁。

你可以从岩德军团那里获得大量的皮手套，以作为备用防具，或是用于[[批量变形]]。

=== 鉴定 ===
皮手套可以轻松地通过[[价格鉴定]]来鉴别，因为它的基础价只有8 {{cnlink|zm}}，是所有手套里最低的。

== 历史 ==
皮手套最初于[[Hack 1.0]]加入游戏。到[[NetHack 2.3e]]为止，皮手套的名称是'''手套'''（pair of gloves），且游戏中仅有皮手套一种手套。

== 起源 ==
“{{注音|弽|shè}}”（yugake）是一种日本弓道用手套。其通常是双层结构，内层由棉制成，外层由鹿皮等兽皮制成，穿戴时保护持弓者的拇指、食指、中指三指。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
Variants with [[object materials]] systems will usually refer to the leather gloves as a "pair of gloves" with the object's material appended (e.g. "a pair of [[cloth]] gloves").

In variants that incorporate the [[Jedi]] role, all Jedi start the game with a +0 pair of leather gloves.

In variants that incorporate the [[Pirate]] role, [[Mayor Cummerbund]] will generate with leather gloves, as will [[githyanki pirate]]s.

===SLASH'EM===
In [[SLASH'EM]], leather gloves can be [[upgraded]] into either [[gauntlets of swimming]] or [[gauntlets of dexterity]]; upgrading either of those gloves will produce leather gloves.

The [[statue trap]] of an [[arch-lich]] in the [[Lawful Quest]] contains a cursed -1 pair of leather gloves.

===NetHack brass===
In [[NetHack brass]], leather gloves do not give any base AC.

===dNetHack===
In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], leather gloves grant 0 base AC and 1 base [[DR]] while worn - they are renamed to a "pair of gloves", and their material is always displayed. [[Gauntlets (dNetHack)|Gauntlets]] exist as a 'hard-material' counterpart to gloves.

All [[Noble]]s start the game with a pair of gloves, and [[Dwarf (starting race)|dwarven]] [[Binder]]s start the game with a +0 burnt pair of gloves.

[[Center of All]] is generated with a large [[Object properties#dNetHack|concordant]] +0 pair of leather gloves.

===EvilHack===
In [[EvilHack]], [[Gauntlets (EvilHack)|gauntlets]] are also present as a 'hard-material' counterpart to leather gloves - all Knights start with gauntlets in place of leather gloves save for [[Elf (starting race)|Elven]] Knights, who retain their leather gloves due to [[iron]] allergies, and [[Drow (starting race)|drow]] Knights, who are similarly averse to iron and receive [[Dark elven gloves|their own racial gloves]].

[[Dragonbane (EvilHack)|Dragonbane]] has its [[base item]] changed to a pair of [[dragonhide]] gloves.

== 百科文本 ==
=== 和弓手套 ===
{{encyclopedia|
Japanese leather archery gloves.  Gloves made for use while
practicing had thumbs reinforced with horn.  Those worn into
battle had thumbs reinforced with a double layer of leather.
}}
